pr_title: Decode max and min optimization more carefully

timeline.message:
Decode max and min optimization more carefully

Fixes the the no-query optimization for `min` and `max` aggregations
for `date_nanos` fields by delegating decoding dates "through" their
`resolution` member.

Closes #52220

timeline.bodyText: This was a javadoc comment in an invalid spot for javadoc.
timeline.author: nik9000
nik9000

timeline.bodyText: There is a ton more ceremony here because resolution is only set when you call build. Bleh.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: I'm a little uncomfortable using a randomization for coverage here.  I'd rather loop over the possible resolution values like we loop over the possible numeric types above.
timeline.author: not-napoleon
